name: Candy Freestyle
description:
Hi all,

Today I present my new game...Candy Freestyle !!!

It's a game with cartoon style graphic and music 8 bit...It's for the old gamer !!!

In this game we found too:

-System High-Score

-Music 8 bit

-Many Bonus

      ....And more !!!

                                         Created By Abergel Julien allias Two Spirit Computers
